name: CategoryTheory.Functor.instReflectsIsomorphismsDiscreteObjWhiskeringLeftIncl
initialProofState:
I : Type u₂
inst✝¹ : CategoryTheory.Category.{v₂, u₂} I
C : Type u₁
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.Category.{v₁, u₁} C
⊢ ((CategoryTheory.whiskeringLeft (CategoryTheory.Discrete I) I C).obj (CategoryTheory.Functor.incl I)).ReflectsIsomorphisms
decl:
instance : ReflectsIsomorphisms <| (whiskeringLeft _ _ C).obj (incl I) where
  reflects f h := by
    simp only [NatTrans.isIso_iff_isIso_app] at *
    intro X
    exact h ⟨X⟩

name: CategoryTheory.Functor.instPreservesLimitOfIsCoreflexivePairDiscreteObjWhiskeringLeftIncl
initialProofState:
I : Type u₂
inst✝² : CategoryTheory.Category.{v₂, u₂} I
C : Type u₁
inst✝¹ : CategoryTheory.Category.{v₁, u₁} C
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.Limits.HasLimitsOfShape CategoryTheory.Limits.WalkingParallelPair C
⊢ CategoryTheory.Comonad.PreservesLimitOfIsCoreflexivePair ((CategoryTheory.whiskeringLeft (CategoryTheory.Discrete I) I C).obj (CategoryTheory.Functor.incl I))

name: CategoryTheory.Functor.instIsLeftAdjointDiscreteTensorLeftCompIncl
initialProofState:
I : Type u₂
inst✝³ : CategoryTheory.Category.{v₂, u₂} I
C : Type u₁
inst✝² : CategoryTheory.Category.{v₁, u₁} C
inst✝¹ : CategoryTheory.MonoidalCategory C
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.MonoidalClosed C
F : CategoryTheory.Functor I C
⊢ (CategoryTheory.MonoidalCategory.tensorLeft ((CategoryTheory.Functor.incl I).comp F)).IsLeftAdjoint
decl:
instance (F : I ⥤ C) : IsLeftAdjoint (tensorLeft (incl I ⋙ F)) :=
  (ihom.adjunction (incl I ⋙ F)).isLeftAdjoint
